mapper.sql: ORDER_ID, MER_USER_ID, MEMBER_ID, MER_ID, SP_CODE, MER_GROUP_ID, ORDER_CODE, CREATE_DATE, TOTAL_PRICE, FINAL_PRICE, MEMBER_DISCOUNT, MEMBER_CODE, PAYMENT_INFO, ORDER_STATUS, PAY_AMOUNT, PAY_METHOD, PAY_DATE, PAY_BILL_NUMBER, CASH_AMOUNT, CASH_CHANGE, MEMBER_BALANCE_PAY, DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, CARD_COUPON_PAY, VERSION, OS, DEVICE_TYPE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, IP_ADDRESS, ORDER_BILL_PRINT, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR_NAME, ORDER_BILL, ORDER_PROFIT, SECOND_PAY_NUMBER, MER_CODE, MER_NAME, TERM_CODE, BANK_NAME, BANK_CARD, BANK_CARD_EXPIRED, AUTHOR_CODE, TRADE_BATCH_CODE, REFER_CODE, ORDER_TYPE, ORDER_CONFIRM, ORDER_CONFIRM_DATE, ORDER_CONFIRM_PERSON
mapper.select:
SELECT SUM(ORDERS.TOTAL_PRICE) AS TOTAL_PRICE, SUM(ORDERS.ORDER_PROFIT) AS ORDER_PROFIT, MERCHANT_GROUPS.GROUP_NAME FROM MERCHANT_GROUPS JOIN ORDERS ON MERCHANT_GROUPS.MER_GROUP_ID = ORDERS.MER_GROUP_ID WHERE ORDERS.MER_ID = #{merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DATEDIFF(ORDERS.CREATE_DATE, #{createDateText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) >= 0 AND DATEDIFF(#{endDateText,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDERS.CREATE_DATE) >= 0 GROUP BY MERCHANT_GROUPS.GROUP_NAME
ORDER BY SUM(ORDERS.FINAL_PRICE) DESC
ORDER BY SUM(ORDERS.ORDER_PROFIT) DESC
mapper.insert: insert into ORDERS (ORDER_ID, MER_USER_ID, MEMBER_ID, MER_ID, SP_CODE, MER_GROUP_ID, ORDER_CODE, CREATE_DATE, TOTAL_PRICE, FINAL_PRICE, MEMBER_DISCOUNT, MEMBER_CODE, PAYMENT_INFO, ORDER_STATUS, PAY_AMOUNT, PAY_METHOD, PAY_DATE, PAY_BILL_NUMBER, CASH_AMOUNT, CASH_CHANGE, MEMBER_BALANCE_PAY, DISCOUNT_AMOUNT, CARD_COUPON_PAY, VERSION, OS, DEVICE_TYPE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, IP_ADDRESS, ORDER_BILL_PRINT, ORDER_BILL, OPERATOR_ID, OPERATOR_NAME, ORDER_TYPE,CHARGE_RATE,CHARGE_AMOUNT ) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{finalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberDiscount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{paymentInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{payBillNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cashAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cashChange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberBalancePay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{discountAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardCouponPay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{os,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderBillPrint,jdbcType=BIT}, #{orderBill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{chargeRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{chargeAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update ORDERS
MER_USER_ID = #{merUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
MER_ID = #{merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SP_CODE = #{spCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MER_GROUP_ID = #{merGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
FINAL_PRICE = #{finalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MEMBER_DISCOUNT = #{memberDiscount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PAYMENT_INFO = #{paymentInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAY_AMOUNT = #{payAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAY_METHOD = #{payMethod,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PAY_DATE = #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
PAY_BILL_NUMBER = #{payBillNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CASH_AMOUNT = #{cashAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CASH_CHANGE = #{cashChange,jdbcType=INTEGER},
MEMBER_BALANCE_PAY = #{memberBalancePay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DISCOUNT_AMOUNT = #{discountAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CARD_COUPON_PAY = #{cardCouponPay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OS = #{os,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEVICE_TYPE = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP_ADDRESS = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_BILL_PRINT = #{orderBillPrint,jdbcType=BIT},
ORDER_BILL = #{orderBill,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR_ID = #{operatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OPERATOR_NAME = #{operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_PROFIT = #{orderProfit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SECOND_PAY_NUMBER = #{secondPayNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MER_CODE = #{merCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MER_NAME = #{merName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TERM_CODE = #{termCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_NAME = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_CARD = #{bankCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_CARD_EXPIRED = #{bankCardExpired,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHOR_CODE = #{authorCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRADE_BATCH_CODE = #{tradeBatchCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REFER_CODE = #{referCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE_RATE = #{chargeRate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CHARGE_AMOUNT = #{chargeAmount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BANK_CARD_TYPE = #{bankCardType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ORDERS set MER_USER_ID = #{merUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MEMBER_ID = #{memberId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, MER_ID = #{merId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SP_CODE = #{spCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MER_GROUP_ID = #{merGroupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_CODE = #{orderCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TOTAL_PRICE = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, FINAL_PRICE = #{finalPrice,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MEMBER_DISCOUNT = #{memberDiscount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MEMBER_CODE = #{memberCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAYMENT_INFO = #{paymentInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_STATUS = #{orderStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAY_AMOUNT = #{payAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PAY_DATE = #{payDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PAY_BILL_NUMBER = #{payBillNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CASH_AMOUNT = #{cashAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CASH_CHANGE = #{cashChange,jdbcType=INTEGER}, MEMBER_BALANCE_PAY = #{memberBalancePay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DISCOUNT_AMOUNT = #{discountAmount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CARD_COUPON_PAY = #{cardCouponPay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OS = #{os,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEVICE_TYPE = #{deviceType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LONGITUDE = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LATITUDE = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IP_ADDRESS = #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_BILL_PRINT = #{orderBillPrint,jdbcType=BIT}, ORDER_BILL = #{orderBill,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_PROFIT = #{orderProfit,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
update ORDERS set ORDER_BILL_PRINT = 1 where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ORDERS set ORDER_PROFIT = (select SUM((GOODS_SALE_PRICE - GOODS_COST) * GOODS_AMOUNT) from ORDER_DETAILS where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where ORDER_ID = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
